function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Importation of cases from Wuhan contributing to local transmission in neighboring and distant provinces","Impact":"Initiation and propagation of large outbreaks in multiple provinces","Mitigation":"Enforcement of travel restrictions and quarantine measures, implementation of local public health responses","Technologies":"Track and trace systems, quarantine monitoring technology","People":"Residents and travelers in affected provinces","Owner":"Government authorities and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in daily case counts better explained by factors unrelated to human mobility from Wuhan","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of travel restrictions in controlling case importations","Mitigation":"Implementation of other local mitigation strategies aimed at halting local transmission","Technologies":"Local public health response systems, contact tracing technology","People":"Residents and travelers in affected provinces","Owner":"Government authorities and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Higher growth rates of the epidemic in provinces outside of Hubei before travel restrictions and control measures were implemented","Impact":"Rapid spread of the epidemic in multiple provinces","Mitigation":"Implementation of travel restrictions and substantial control measures","Technologies":"Travel restriction monitoring systems, remote temperature monitoring","People":"Residents and travelers in affected provinces","Owner":"Government authorities and public health organizations"}]}
